overview: Isabel Sarli was the first Argentine actress to be naked and open on the big screen. For the time, this generated not only great controversy, as well as censorship, but a quasi-divine fanaticism among its viewers. To date, Isabel “La Coca” Sarli is considered a national symbol of sexuality and eroticism. This film was made by intervening the original 35mm material from the trailer of one of the last films in which Isabel worked as an actress.
title: Mirando las estrellas
